meanings.definition: To increase the speed of an engine
meanings.sent1: He enjoys revving the motorcycle engine before riding.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was revving the car engine to test its performance.
meanings.sent3: Revving the lawnmower engine too much made the neighbors laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sound of revving engines filled the air at the race track.
meanings.sent5: Revving the engine like a pro, he impressed everyone with his skills.

meanings.definition: To operate an engine at a high speed
meanings.sent1: She was revving the boat engine to reach the shore quickly.
meanings.sent2: The truck driver was revving the engine to climb the steep hill.
meanings.sent3: Revving the engine loudly startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The sound of revving engines echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: Revving the engine relentlessly, he pushed the car to its limits.
